thread.title: 'Vanderpump Rules' Star Scheana Marie Dating Robert Valletta
thread.title_full: 'Vanderpump Rules' Star Scheana Marie Dating Robert Valletta

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: 'Vanderpump Rules' Star Scheana Marie Dating Robert Valletta
text: 'Vanderpump Rules' Star Scheana Marie Dating Robert Valletta by Jennifer Drysdale 12:56   Scheana Marie has a new man in her life! The Vanderpump Rules star is dating actor Robert Valletta, a source close to Scheana tells ET. The pair was spotted together at an OK! Magazine party at Nightingale Plaza in West Hollywood, California, on Wednesday. WATCH: 'Vanderpump Rules' Star Scheana Shay Talks Divorce, Denies Dating Hilary Duff's Ex "They're not super serious right now," ET's source reveals. "They've been friends for a decade." "The romance part of their friendship is new. They were working together on a project and it's the first time they've both been single in their friendship," the source explained. During the party, Scheana and Robert, whose sister is model and actress Amber Valletta, were seen holding hands and smiling ear to ear. "Robert kept her close wherever they went," an eyewitness tells ET, adding that they left the party together in the same car. Scheana even made an appearance on Robert's Instagram Story. Photo: Instagram ET caught up with Scheana at the OK! Magazine Pre-GRAMMY party a couple of weeks ago, where she gushed about how happy she was. "I'm in a very good place right now. I'm happy, I'm healthy," she said. "I'm good." The 31-year-old reality star also opened up about the upcoming season finale of Vanderpump Rules , after fans saw her marriage to Mike Shay crumble onscreen. "I think it definitely ended on a good note, but then we kind of pick things up on a bad note," she revealed. "You'll see it all play out." Reporting by Brendon Geoffrion.
